TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示该特性化的程序集是主互操作程序集。

span.span: Indicates that the attributed assembly is a primary interop assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此特性应用于程序集，尽管[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)通常为您应用导入类型库时。You can apply this attribute to assemblies, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it imports a type library. 互操作程序集中包含描述通常已经描述的 COM 类型库中的现有 COM 类型的元数据。An interop assembly contains metadata that describes existing COM types, which are often already described in a COM type library. Tlbimp.exe 生成从 COM 类型库的互操作程序集。Tlbimp.exe produces interop assemblies from COM type libraries. 互操作程序集通常仅包含元数据 （无代码）。Interop assemblies typically only contain metadata (no code). 主互操作程序集均由它们描述和提供与该类型库定义的类型的正式定义的类型库相同的发布者提供。Primary interop assemblies are provided by the same publisher as the type library they describe, and provide the official definitions of the types defined with that type library. 主互操作程序集始终由发布者签名其来确保唯一性。Primary interop assemblies are always signed by their publisher to ensure uniqueness. 你可以从类型库生成主互操作程序集，通过以下方式：You can generate a primary interop assembly from a type library in the following ways: - 运行使用 TlbImp.exe`/primary`从命令行选项。Run TlbImp.exe with the `/primary` option from the command line. - 应用在设计时。Apply the at design time. 若要在托管的源代码中指定主互操作程序集，必须应用和对在设计时的程序集。To specify a primary interop assembly in managed source code, you must apply the and to the assembly at design time. 上的主互操作程序集标识的类型库的 LIBID 和标识的特定类型库的此程序集的主互操作程序集的版本。The on the primary interop assembly identifies the LIBID of the type library and the identifies the version of the particular type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly. 可以出现多次，如果程序集的相同的类型库的多个版本的主互操作程序集。The can appear multiple times if the assembly is the primary interop assembly for multiple versions of the same type library. 在使用类型库中定义的类型时，始终引用该类型库，而不是重新导入或重新定义这些类型本身主互操作程序集。When using the types defined in a type library, always reference the primary interop assembly for that type library, rather than reimporting or redefining the types themselves. 有关指导原则和如何生成或使用主互操作程序集的过程，请参阅[主互操作程序集](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b977a8be-59a0-40a0-a806-b11ffba5c080(v=vs.100))。For guidelines and procedures on how to produce or use primary interop assemblies, see [Primary Interop Assemblies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b977a8be-59a0-40a0-a806-b11ffba5c080(v=vs.100)). 类型库导入过程的详细说明，请参阅[类型库到程序集的转换摘要](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf3f90c5-4770-4ab8-895c-3ba1055cc958(v=vs.100))。For a detailed description of the type library importing process, see [Type Library to Assembly Conversion Summary](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf3f90c5-4770-4ab8-895c-3ba1055cc958(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 major, int32 minor) cil managed
Public Sub New (major As Integer, minor As Integer)

param.name: major
param.span: 程序集是其主互操作程序集的类型库的主版本号。

span.span: The major version of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

param.name: minor
param.span: 程序集是其主互操作程序集的类型库的次版本号。

span.span: The minor version of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

summary.span: 使用类型库（此程序集是该类型库的主互操作程序集）的主版本号及次版本号初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the major and minor version numbers of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以出现多次，如果程序集的相同的类型库的多个版本的主互操作程序集。The can appear multiple times if the assembly is the primary interop assembly for multiple versions of the same type library.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MajorVersion As Integer
public: property int MajorVersion { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取程序集是其主互操作程序集的类型库的主版本号。

span.span: Gets the major version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

value.span: 程序集是其主 Interop 程序集的类型库的主要版本号。

span.span: The major version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MinorVersion As Integer
public: property int MinorVersion { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取程序集是其主互操作程序集的类型库的次版本号。

span.span: Gets the minor version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

value.span: 程序集是其主 Interop 程序集的类型库的次要版本号。

span.span: The minor version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.
